author: USA TODAY, Ryan W. Miller, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus sickened a tiger at the Bronx Zoo. Does that mean cats are at risk?
description: A tiger at the Bronx Zoo was sickened with the new coronavirus, but veterinary experts say more research is needed into how COVID-19 could affect pets.
content:
A four-year-old tiger in the Bronx Zoo has tested positive for coronavirus after developing symptoms.
Wochit
